body.para: The following issue has been closed.
Resolver: Vincent Massol Date: Mon, 6 Sep 2004 1:04 PM

Applied Thanks. Next time could you please also add a patch for the
aggregators.xml documentation file? As I'm not a JCoverage expert, could you
please describe exactly what your aggregator does. I've written "Total
percentage of lines covered" but I'm not sure that's right. --------------------------------------------------------------------- View the issue: http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MPDASHBOARD-11

Here is an overview of the issue: --------------------------------------------------------------------- Key: MPDASHBOARD-11 Summary: New aggregator : JCoverage covered lines percentile Type: New Feature
Status: Closed Priority: Major Resolution: FIXED
Original Estimate: 5 minutes Time Spent: Unknown Remaining: 5 minutes
Assignee: Vincent Massol Reporter: Thomas Recloux
Created: Mon, 6 Sep 2004 4:43 AM Updated: Mon, 6 Sep 2004 1:04 PM

Description: I have developped this aggregator for Jcoverage, it computes the lines coverage
percentile. I'll join the patch.txt and the agregator .jelly file.
I have added the aggregator to the tests
Thanks to Mathieu Fosse for his help.
